compliant.section: The purpose thereof is to protect against accidental or unlawful destruction or alteration, accidental loss, unauthorized disclosure or access and against other unlawful forms of processing.

non_compliant.section: We conduct internal reviews of our information collection, storage and processing practices and security measures, as well as physical security measures to guard against unauthorized access to systems where we store your Information (whether you are on-line or off-line).
non_compliant.legal provisions: This section describes actions taken, but GDPR Article 32 focuses on the 'what' (appropriate technical and organizational measures) rather than the 'how' (specific actions taken).
non_compliant.amend: This section could be amended to focus on the types of security measures implemented, aligning with the 'what' of Article 32. For example, it could mention pseudonymization, encryption, ensuring ongoing confidentiality, integrity, availability, and resilience of systems, data restoration capabilities, and regular testing and evaluation of the effectiveness of these measures.
